price: 70. solo me ha sido revelado que no soy más que un amonestador que les expone con claridad (los mandatos de Al-lah)”.
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
